subject: Getting Started
author: brian_empson
full_text:
Hello all,

First post.  I want to get started with this stuff, and figured the best place would be EVP.  I got an IC recorder and am ready to go.  I have a few questions though.

At my friend's house there is *something* that likes to make noises when it knows you can hear it.  It'll make big loud footsteps and generally try to scare the crap out of you.  It would seem like a good place to start buuuuut I don't know if attempting to communicate with it will make things worse.  Good idea?  Bad idea?  Does it matter?

I really wanted to tryout that allophone + EVPMaker combo that seems to be generating some good results.  EVP voices are so faint it's incredibly hard for me to make them out at this point.

Lastly, how do you deal with family and relatives that disapprove of this stuff?  I live alone (well, with a roommate) and they seem to think I'm getting into some sort of voodoo or sorcery or something.  They seem to think that the voices are all demons or something.  I don't know how to explain it to them, I wish I could get them to understand.  I am generally a curious person so it was only a matter of time before I actually started with this stuff.

Thanks for reading!  :)
